inclusion.criterion: Ambulant patients with BMD diagnosis confirmed by genetic testing.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able and willing to give informed consent in writing.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to perform 6MWT at screening with a minimum distance of 200 m and maximum distance of 450 m.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: If in treatment with systemic corticosteroids and/or angiotensin-converting-enzyme (ACE) inhibitor , and/or β or α adrenergic receptor blocker, no significant change in dosage or dosing regimen (excluding changes related to body weight change) for a minimum of 6 months immediately prior to start of study treatment.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must be willing to use adequate contraception. Contraceptive methods must be used from Randomization through 3 months after the last dose of study treatment.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Exposure to another investigational drug within 3 months prior to the start of study treatment.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Use of any pharmacologic treatment, other than corticosteroids, that might have an effect on muscle strength or function within 3 months prior to the start of study treatment (e.g., growth hormone). Vitamin D, calcium, and any other supplements will be allowed.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Surgery that might affect muscle strength or function within 3 months before study entry or planned surgery at any time during the study.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient A is a 30-year-old male with TB diagnosis, no significant medical history. He is ambulant and willing to give informed consent.
